data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Teredorus Hancock, 1906 (Orthoptera, Tetrigidae) from China, with a key to the species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deng, Wei-An, Lei, Chao-Liang, Zheng, Zhe-Min (2014): Two new species of the genus Teredorus Hancock, 1906 (Orthoptera, Tetrigidae) from China, with a key to the species of the genus. ZooKeys 431: 33-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.431.8002, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.431.8002
